1.body: This is a hastily made website used as a platform for me to learn webdev. Things are going to be ugly and broken more often than not. I'd appreciate feedback at /hello/ if you would be so kind
1.title: Welcome!

2.body:
This page is "_default" of a tinydb database. I'm going to use it to store news posts and later on, implement categories using tables other than "_default".

The shoutbox at /hello/ autosorts into pages of 50 or so after filling up _default. adding history to that should be fairly easy due to that auto paging
2.title: This page
